soft.geometry: This was an important read. From day 1 of this we have been swinging between trying to “make the most of this” to keep our small furniture business going because design trade-shows which we depend on a lot have got cancelled and we can’t send out shipments - so trying to innovate and find positive solutions was kind of necessary. But by day two of being bombarded with all of the Instagram advice and positive spins - we were drained and realized we need more than a minute to process this and honestly just needed some sleep. You are so right that different people process this differently and sometimes the same people feel differently about this everyday- like us. Its confusing but we’ll figure it out but maybe collectively we need to think about how our social media lives during this shitty situation might affect others. 💖
